name: O! Nalchik is my favourite place
name_original: O! Nalchik is my favourite place
description:
O! Nalchik is my favourite place - is simple archery game. You need eleminate all baloons and dont let run out arrows

Basic rules:
Hold and move on screen to control the angle and power of a shoot. Release to shoot the arrow. Elimate all the balloons within the limited arrows and do not let any of them fly out of the screen.Some balloon can not be breaked by arrows. So it was interesting to find indirectly way for killing them.

Feathers:
-Lovely music
-Nice graphics
-23 simple levels
